problems.title: Maximum Subarray Sum
problems.description: Given an integer array nums, find the contiguous subarray (containing at least one number) which has the largest sum and return its sum.
problems.inputFormat:
First line contains integer n (1 ≤ n ≤ 10^5) - the length of array.
Second line contains n integers a_i (-10^4 ≤ a_i ≤ 10^4) - array elements.
problems.outputFormat: Print a single integer - the maximum sum of contiguous subarray.

problems.title: Rotate Array
problems.description: Given an array, rotate the array to the right by k steps, where k is non-negative.
problems.inputFormat:
First line contains two integers n and k (1 ≤ n ≤ 10^5, 0 ≤ k ≤ 10^9) - array length and rotation steps.
Second line contains n integers a_i (1 ≤ a_i ≤ 10^9) - array elements.
problems.outputFormat: Print n integers - the rotated array.

testCases.explanation: k=5 is same as k=1 for length 2

problems.title: Find Missing Number
problems.description: Given an array nums containing n distinct numbers in the range [0, n], return the only number in the range that is missing from the array.
problems.inputFormat:
First line contains integer n (1 ≤ n ≤ 10^4).
Second line contains n integers - array elements (each in range [0, n]).
problems.outputFormat: Print a single integer - the missing number.

problems.title: Product of Array Except Self
problems.description: Given an integer array nums, return an array answer such that answer[i] is equal to the product of all the elements of nums except nums[i]. You must write an algorithm that runs in O(n) time and without using the division operation.
problems.inputFormat:
First line contains integer n (2 ≤ n ≤ 10^5).
Second line contains n integers a_i (1 ≤ |a_i| ≤ 30) - array elements.
problems.outputFormat: Print n integers - the product array.
constraints: Product of any prefix/suffix fits in 32-bit integer

problems.title: Container With Most Water
problems.description: You are given an integer array height of length n. There are n vertical lines drawn such that the two endpoints of the i-th line are (i, 0) and (i, height[i]). Find two lines that together with the x-axis form a container, such that the container contains the most water. Return the maximum amount of water a container can store.
problems.inputFormat:
First line contains integer n (2 ≤ n ≤ 10^5).
Second line contains n integers h_i (0 ≤ h_i ≤ 10^4) - heights.
problems.outputFormat: Print a single integer - maximum water area.

testCases.explanation: Lines at index 1 and 8, area = min(8,7) * 7 = 49
Lines at index 0 and 5, area = min(4,5) * 5 = 20? No, distance is 5

problems.title: Find All Duplicates in Array
problems.description: Given an integer array nums of length n where all integers are in the range [1, n] and each integer appears once or twice, return an array of all the integers that appears twice. You must solve it without extra space and in O(n) runtime.
problems.inputFormat:
First line contains integer n (1 ≤ n ≤ 10^5).
Second line contains n integers a_i (1 ≤ a_i ≤ n).
problems.outputFormat: Print all duplicate numbers in any order (space-separated). If no duplicates, print empty line.
constraints: Each element appears once or twice
